title: French American Alliance formed in 1778 - effect

content.question: Which of the following was true of the French-American Alliance formed in 1778?

choices.label: It contributed little to the American victory in the Revolutionary War.
It restricted French naval activity to the high seas, far from the North American coast.
It influenced the British to offer generous peace terms in the Treaty of Paris in 1783.
It allowed the French to repossess their North American colonies lost in 1763.
It specifically prohibited the deployment of French troops on North American soil.

content.answer: It influenced the British to offer generous peace terms in the Treaty of Paris in 1783.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
